content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Alien Breed™ 2: Assault is an explosive science fiction arcade-shooter with an epic story, swarms of highly intelligent alien enemies, high-impact weapons and rich, detailed environments. In addition to the thrilling single-player campaign and all new 'Survivor' modes, the game offers action-packed, online or local two-player co-operative battle modes.

- Epic single-player story mode: The single-player campaign mode that follows the narrative of the game through huge and challenging environments.


- NEW: Single-player 'Survivor' mode. Resist endless waves of intense alien horde attacks in specifically designed arena environments.

- Two-player co-operative play mode: Work together to defeat the alien horde across specially customised assault maps for two players, online or local play.

- NEW: Two-player co-operative 'Survivor' mode – Join forces and try to survive specifically designed arena environments, online or local play.    

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
